articles.author: Jeff Mason
articles.description: Trump also said he will announce reciprocal tariffs on Tuesday or Wednesday, to take effect almost immediately.
articles.title: Trump to announce 25% steel and aluminum tariffs in latest trade escalation

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Marriages in China dropped by a fifth last year despite manifold efforts by authorities to encourage young couples to wed and have children to boost the country's declining population.
articles.title: Chinese marriages slid by a fifth in 2024, further fanning birthrate concerns

articles.author: Sarita Singh, Shivangi Acharya, Shivam Patel
articles.description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi is preparing additional tariff cuts ahead of his meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump that could boost American exports to India and avoid a potential trade war, government officials said.
articles.title: India's Modi to meet Trump with planned tariff concessions

articles.author: Jeff Mason
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday he is committed to buying and owning Gaza, but could allow sections of the war-ravaged land to be rebuilt by other states in the Middle East.
articles.title: Trump wants US to own Gaza, could let Middle East states help rebuild

articles.author: Alexandra Valencia, Yury Garcia
articles.description: Noboa says his deployment of the military on the streets and within prisons has reduced violent deaths by 15%, led to a drastic fall in prison violence, and helped in the capture of major gang leaders.
articles.title: Run-off likely in Ecuador presidential race as leftist gains

articles.author: Brad Brooks
articles.description: Three Venezuelan men detained in New Mexico on Sunday asked a federal judge to preemptively block the U.S. government from sending them to a military base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, according to a court filing.
articles.title: Venezuelan detainees in US file motion over possible Guantanamo transfer

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Nicaragua's government described the Vatican as "depraved" and "pedophile" on Sunday, two days after an interview on Catholic television channel EWTN with exiled Nicaraguan Bishop Rolando Alvarez, one of the fiercest critics of President Daniel Ortega.
articles.title: Nicaragua blasts Vatican after exiled bishop's TV appearance

articles.author: Joey Roulette, Jeff Mason
articles.description: "They look like Holocaust survivors," Trump said of the gaunt condition of the latest hostages to be freed. "I don't know how much longer we can take that."
articles.title: Trump says US might lose patience with ceasefire deal

articles.author: Marc Jones, Steven Scheer
articles.description: A historic shake-up of the Middle East is starting to draw international investors, warming to the prospects of relative peace and economic recovery after so much turmoil.
articles.title: New look Middle East had started to draw investors... and then came Trump

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Overnight Russian drone attacks sparked a fire in Kyiv and injured a woman and damaged several houses in the northeastern city of Sumy, Ukrainian officials said on Monday.
articles.title: Russia launches drone attacks on Kyiv, Sumy, Ukrainian officials say
